name: Froggy Fractions
description:
Use the left and right arrow keys to move the frog along the platform.

Use the up arrow to jump.

Use the right mouse button to click and drag fraction pieces, release the right mouse button to snap the fraction pieces together. 

Game Description: Players’ frogs hop around the pond looking for fraction pieces that, when added together, will equal one whole, but they need to be careful to stay away from predators, or they might not survive in their habitat. The point of the game is to have players interact and manipulate the fractional pieces to build the whole because all fractions come from one whole of something.  Players need to identify and obtain the scattered fractions from around the pond to create one whole.
